page.title: 14Commuting & Family Firms
page.content:
In our sample of 163 {9%}of the people who go to work go{long distances}to places like{Birmingham, Chester,Leeds, {Wales,Taunton,Bristol,London}and {Droitwich}while the other{91%}work within a{10 mile radius}to places like {Kemerton,Pershore,Worcester, Bredons {Norton,Bredon,Tewkesbury, Ashchurch, {Chester,Cheltenham,Ashton & Bishops {Cleeve.}About{2% go abroad.}
{Family Businesses. There are thirteen family businesses in our twelve kilometre square.They are{Dadswell}windows{,Drapers}bakery, {Wilcroft}plastics{,Washbourn}builders, {Jeynes}builders{,Grainger's Dairy, {Woodward }toys, {Warners}transport{,Stanway}screens, {Bredon tele centre}and{Bredon garage.
